languages.text: Из последних сил я тянусь к осколочному карабину, стреляю Жертве в упор прямо в лицо... Кристаллический снаряд проходит в волоске от {mf|его|ее} головы. Под сокрушительным ударом мое великолепное оружие с траурным хрустом обращается в обломки.

My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.
languages.original_text: Из последних сил я тянусь к осколочному карабину, стреляю Жертве в упор прямо в лицо... Кристаллический снаряд проходит в волоске от {mf|его|ее} головы. Под сокрушительным ударом мое великолепное оружие с траурным хрустом обращается в обломки.

traits.locale_text: I reach for the Shardcarbine with the last of my strength, and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 力尽きた私はシャードカービンに手を伸ばし、至近距離から獲物の顔面に向かって撃った…結晶のような弾丸は、獲物の顔面ぎりぎりまで飛んでいった。壊滅的な一撃により、私の見事な武器は悲痛な音を立てて瓦礫と化した。
languages.original_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.

traits.locale_text: 力尽きた私はシャードカービンに手を伸ばし、至近距離から獲物の顔面に向かって撃った…結晶のような弾丸は、獲物の顔面ぎりぎりまで飛んでいった。壊滅的な一撃により、私の見事な武器は悲痛な音を立てて瓦礫と化した。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 我的力量越来越弱，我伸手去拿那把碎片卡宾枪，朝猎物的脸近距离开了一枪……然而，水晶子弹却在几根发丝之外的距离呼啸而过。随后，猎物猛地砸在了我那把漂亮的卡宾枪上，它发出了一声悲哀的嘎吱声，变成了一团垃圾。
languages.original_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.

traits.locale_text: 我的力量越来越弱，我伸手去拿那把碎片卡宾枪，朝猎物的脸近距离开了一枪……然而，水晶子弹却在几根发丝之外的距离呼啸而过。随后，猎物猛地砸在了我那把漂亮的卡宾枪上，它发出了一声悲哀的嘎吱声，变成了一团垃圾。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mientras las fuerzas me abandonan, alcanzo la carabina cristalina y disparo a la presa a la cara, a quemarropa... El proyectil cristalino casi roza su rostro. Un golpe brutal convierte mi magnífica arma en esquirlas con un crujido lastimero.
languages.original_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.

traits.locale_text: Mientras las fuerzas me abandonan, alcanzo la carabina cristalina y disparo a la presa a la cara, a quemarropa... El proyectil cristalino casi roza su rostro. Un golpe brutal convierte mi magnífica arma en esquirlas con un crujido lastimero.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mit schwindender Kraft greife ich nach dem Splitterkarabiner und schieße der Beute aus nächster Nähe mitten ins Gesicht ... Das kristalline Projektil saust um Haaresbreite an ihrem Gesicht vorbei. Mit einem traurigen Knacken verwandelt ein verheerender Hieb meine großartige Waffe zu Abfall.
languages.original_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.

traits.locale_text: Mit schwindender Kraft greife ich nach dem Splitterkarabiner und schieße der Beute aus nächster Nähe mitten ins Gesicht ... Das kristalline Projektil saust um Haaresbreite an ihrem Gesicht vorbei. Mit einem traurigen Knacken verwandelt ein verheerender Hieb meine großartige Waffe zu Abfall.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Je rassemble mes dernières forces pour m'emparer de ma carabine éclateuse et tire dans la tête de la proie à bout portant... mais le projectile cristallin passe à quelques millimètres de son visage. Un coup dévastateur vient percuter mon arme qui se disloque avec un craquement sinistre.
languages.original_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.

traits.locale_text: Je rassemble mes dernières forces pour m'emparer de ma carabine éclateuse et tire dans la tête de la proie à bout portant... mais le projectile cristallin passe à quelques millimètres de son visage. Un coup dévastateur vient percuter mon arme qui se disloque avec un craquement sinistre.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Gücüm tükeniyorken parçakarabinama uzanıyorum ve sıfır mesafeden Avımın yüzüne ateş açıyorum. Kristal mermiler, yüzünü kıl payı ıskalıyor. Ezici bir darbe, muazzam silahımın kederli bir çıtırtıyla paramparça olmasına neden oluyor.
languages.original_text: My strength waning, I reach for the shardcarbine and shoot the Prey right in the face at point-blank range... The crystalline projectile whizzes within a hair's breadth of its face. A crushing blow turns my magnificent weapon to rubble with a mournful crunch.

traits.locale_text: Gücüm tükeniyorken parçakarabinama uzanıyorum ve sıfır menzilden Av'ımın yüzüne ateş ediyorum. Kristal atışlar, yüzünü kıl payı ıskalıyor. Ezici bir darbe, muazzam silahımın kederli bir çıtırtıyla paramparça olmasına neden oluyor.
traits.speaker: Player
